name: SpaceGame (Matt)
description:
A casual space MMO I recently started working on. It is still in a really early state. I'm still working on adding some of the basic features. If the server is unavailable something broke, so shoot me a message.

It the current build you can mine by shooting asteroids, buy and sell resources and buy new ships. There is also a global chat. 

I'm working on getting all the base features in place right now. After that I want to work on updating the social stuff like parties and organizations,  and chat. Then I want to implement player built (home) stations.  Then the final thing will be the content update where I fill out the universe with more stuff.

Controls:

  • [1]  Fire Mode
  • [2] Scan Mode
  • [3] Collect Mode
  • Right click to move
  •  Left click target
  •  [I] Cargo
  •  [Tab] Chat display mode
  • [F11] Full screen
